English: This decision shows all optional decisions related to a 'Disunited Kingdom'. As with other setting decisions, they will go away January 1, 1837.\n\n§RUse these decisions at your own risk! They definitely have the potential to break flavor...§!
This decisions hides all optional decisions related to a 'Disunited Kingdom'. As with other setting decisions, they will go away January 1, 1837.
Release Canada and all Canadian minors from the UK.
Released Ireland from the UK. §RIf you want to play as Ireland, Scotland or Wales, I would suggest releasing all three of them before clicking the 'play' decision§!.
Released Scotland from the UK. §RIf you want to play as Ireland, Scotland or Wales, I would suggest releasing all three of them before clicking the 'play' decision§!.
Released Wales from the UK. §RIf you want to play as Ireland, Scotland or Wales, I would suggest releasing all three of them before clicking the 'play' decision§!.
Release South Africa from the UK.
Release New Zealand from the UK.
